FuncDef: This command enables LFA Protection using segment routing backup node SID.

ParaDef.Info: The IP prefix in dotted decimal notation for the range used by the ABR to advertise that summarizes the area into another area. Values-ip-prefix/mask:.
specifies the index for this backup node SID. Values-0 to 4294967295.
specifies the SID value for this backup node SID. Values-1 to 4294967295.
